Test Name: Epstein-Barr Virus (EBV), Molecular Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Blood, plasma, serum, throat swab, or cerebrospinal fluid (CSF)
Purpose: Molecular detection of Epstein-Barr Virus DNA for patient diagnosis and monitoring
Container: Sterile, DNA-free collection tube or vacutainer (sodium citrate, sodium fluoride, EDTA, or heparinized)
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, real-time PCR machine, DNA extraction kit
